classification_data.text: RELACIÓN PRINCIPALES ACCIONISTAS De acuerdo con su solicitud, nos permitimos informar que la relación de nuestros principales accionistas se encuentra debidamente actualizada en la página web del Grupo. A continuación, relacionamos el link en el cual puede encontrarla: https://www.grupoexito.com.co/es/principales-accionistas La presente certificación se expide a los 01 días del mes de Febrero de 2024. Cualquier información adicional que requieran, no duden en contactarnos. Cordialmente, _________________________________________ Giovanny Humberto Velasquez Ruiz Apoderado Especial

content.thinking: Let me analyze this PDF document following the classification workflow: 1. **TEXT EXTRACTION** The document contains substantial text in Spanish. The main content is: - "RELACIÓN PRINCIPALES ACCIONISTAS" (Relation of Main Shareholders) - Explains that the information about main shareholders is available and updated on the company website - Provides a URL: https://www.grupoexito.com.co/es/principales-accionistas - Dated February 1, 2024 - Signed by Giovanny Humberto Velasquez Ruiz, Special Attorney - Company logo shows "grupo éxito" 2. **PRIORITY CHECKS** - NOT BLANK: There is substantial meaningful content - LINK_ONLY: The main purpose is to redirect to a URL for shareholder information. The document states "la relación de nuestros principales accionistas se encuentra debidamente actualizada en la página web del Grupo" and then provides the link "https://www.grupoexito.com.co/es/principales-accionistas". The document doesn't contain the actual shareholder information but redirects to where it can be found. Looking at the LINK_ONLY definition: "documents whose main content consists of hyperlinks/URLs that direct to external sources to obtain real information, may have a minimum of explanatory text" This fits exactly - the document's main purpose is to redirect someone asking about shareholder information to a website URL where the actual information can be found. The rest is just minimal explanatory text explaining that the information is available at the provided link. This should be classified as LINK_ONLY since the primary function is redirection to external sources for the actual information, not providing the information itself.
